name: vsexecute
description: A VSCode extension allowing you to execute scripts through WebSockets.

vsexecute.single.description: Allows only one client to execute at a time. Overrides max clients.

vsexecute.maxClients.description: The maximum number of clients that can execute at the same time.

vsexecute.alertExecution.description: Whether to alert the user (in the output) when a script is executing.

vsexecute.allowSelectionExecution.description: Allows the user to execute the higlighted portion of a script.

vsexecute.allowBackupEditors.description: Allows the extension to execute other visible editors if no editor is selected.

vsexecute.strictLanguageExecution.description: Specifically only allow .lua and .txt files to be executed.

vsexecute.workspace.Path.description: The path to the executor's workspace folder. Required for communication (if UWP is disabled).

vsexecute.workspace.UWP.description: Whether the extension is running in a UWP environment. Overrides workspace path.

vsexecute.timeout.description: The amount of time to wait for a response from the client before disconnecting (in milliseconds).
